channel.title: More errors :( - Quests
channel.description:
[s]Well, I have solved 19 of my problems from [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531193.0.html]this[/url] topic.
I have 2 errors now:
src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:58: illegal start of expression sendPlayerChat2("Fine!",); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:63: illegal start of expression sendPlayerChat2("I killed it!",); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/s]
Now I have fixed that, but now [s]16[/s] [s]14[/s] [s]12[/s] 9 more errors.
[code]src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:79: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerhere location: class server.model.players.Client p.playerhere = Integer.parseInt(token2); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:278: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerhere location: class server.model.players.Client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerhere), 0, Integer.toStr ing(p.playerhere).length()); ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerSave.java:278: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playerhere location: class server.model.players.Client characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerhere), 0, Integer.toStr ing(p.playerhere).length());
^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:28: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String, java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in serv er.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lan g.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) sendNpcChat4("Oh yes!", "I would like you to go to Sir P rysin. He's at Falador.", "He will tell you some things I don't want to say.", c .talkingNpc, "Fear Reaper"); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:43: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String, java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in serv er.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,java.lan g.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) sendNpcChat4("So Fear Reaper send you to me? Okay!", "I would like you to go kill a dragon! It's at", "Seers' Village.", c.talkingNpc, " Sir Prysin"); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:53: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String, java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in serv er.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int,java .lang.String) sendNpcChat4("Yes you! Don't you argue with me!", c.talk ingNpc, "Sir Prysin"); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:58: sendPlayerChat2(java.lang.Stri ng,java.lang.String) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied t o (java.lang.String) sendPlayerChat2("Fine!"); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:63: sendPlayerChat2(java.lang.Stri ng,java.lang.String) in server.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied t o (java.lang.String) sendPlayerChat2("I killed it!"); ^ src\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:68: sendNpcChat4(java.lang.String, java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,int,java.lang.String) in serv er.model.players.DialogueHandler cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int,java .lang.String) sendNpcChat4("Great job! You have really proven yourself adventurer.", c.talkingNpc, "Sir Prysin"); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 9 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Use this for what I added:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,531144.0.html

item.title: More errors :( - Quests
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

MajorPro:

Your welcome. If you need help with anything else, just give me a shout.

Mk.

MAJORPRO!!! GET ME MY TOOTHBRUSH!

I dont get #1…

Read full topic

item.title: More errors :( - Quests
item.dc:creator: @MajorPro MajorPro
item.description:
@MajorPro wrote:

Your welcome. If you need help with anything else, just give me a shout.

Read full topic

item.title: More errors :( - Quests
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“MajorPro, post:5, topic:428605”]I’m not going to spoon feed the code, but I will tell you your mistakes.

1. playerHere is not defined unless "public int here" is suppose to be playerHere. If so, then fix that. 2. sendNpcChat4 is used with 4 lines of text, all your errors from that have 3 and 1 text lines. If you do not have sendNpcChat for 1-3 lines of text, then review sendNpcChat4 and create your own. 3. sendPlayerChat2 is the same thing as I said for sendNpcChat4.
See if you can fix them. :)[/quote]
Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: More errors :( - Quests
item.dc:creator: @MajorPro MajorPro
item.description:
@MajorPro wrote:

I’m not going to spoon feed the code, but I will tell you your mistakes.

1. playerHere is not defined unless "public int here" is suppose to be playerHere. If so, then fix that. 2. sendNpcChat4 is used with 4 lines of text, all your errors from that have 3 and 1 text lines. If you do not have sendNpcChat for 1-3 lines of text, then review sendNpcChat4 and create your own. 3. sendPlayerChat2 is the same thing as I said for sendNpcChat4.
See if you can fix them.

Read full topic

Updated topic.

item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

makes tutorials with a BAM but can’t fix em
:fp:

I just looked to the first ones,
obviously nomad isn’t a variable so
WHY U NO DECLARE IT

and use goddamn code tags

Read full topic

[s]Well, I have solved 19 of my problems from this topic.

I have 2 errors now:
